SFormat module

class SFormat.SFormat(rsn: int = 0, direction: str = 'OUT')[source]

Bases: Frame

SFormat class represents a specific type of IEC104 frame. It inherits from the Frame class and provides methods for serializing the frame and managing the RSN (Receive Sequence Number) field.

serialize(rsn: int = 0) → bytes[source]

Serialize the SFormat frame into bytes.

Parameters:

rsn – The Request Sequence Number to be used for serialization. If not provided, the current RSN will be used.

Returns:

The serialized frame as bytes.

property rsn: int

Get the current Receive Sequence Number.

Returns:

The current RSN.
